channel.title: The worst you've ever scared somebody
channel.description: Well, when i was younger i use to sneak around my house in the dark and prey on my family. So this one time it was like 11:00 and i was getting a glass of water and i heard someone so i hid behind my fridge and jumped out at the person! I scared my mom so badly she nocked the microwave off the counter and threw her coffe everywhere!

item.title: The worst you've ever scared somebody
item.dc:creator: @cow821 cow821
item.description:
@cow821 wrote:

On Halloween my friend and I ran down the street in tan turbans shouting arabic things. Parents and thier children ran. I never forgot that day…

item.dc:creator: @chipmunk_man chipmunk man
item.description:
@chipmunk_man wrote:

My friend is petrified of chucky the litle doll so i got a little doll got a body like chuckies and bought a chucky mask and put a [size=20pt]HUGE[/size] butcher knife in his hand omg he crapped and pissed his pants then fainted!! And then he mysteriously disiapeared… move alone nothing to see here

item.title: The worst you've ever scared somebody
item.dc:creator: @bloodrayne bloodrayne
item.description:
@bloodrayne wrote:

Last Halloween, my mom had bought this really weird mask that looked like a werewolf… So one night when my grandparents were coming over, I had just finished talking to my friend and had the mask on, but I dropped a floppy disk he had given me, and it was pitch black, so I went in the bushes to find it. When I finally found it and came out, my grandma happened to be there and I gave her the jump of her life when I appeared head first.

Read full topic

item.description:
@yakman wrote:

[quote=“Yz85Racer, post:16, topic:29841”][quote author=yakman link=topic=43786.msg554241#msg554241 date=1165028923]
when i walk around my area with a hood up,
i see some mothers with pushchairs and older people cross the road, probably because of me
[/quote]
I can’t imagine that lol.[/quote]

well imagin that people cant see your face, you can see thet they are scared, they cross the road almost as soon as they see you

failing that, you could just take your moblie phone and wallet, put it in your pocket so people can see, then walk around the back alleys

item.title: The worst you've ever scared somebody
item.dc:creator: @jimmy0s Jimmy OS
item.description:
@jimmy0s wrote:

joechilds2:

lmao… i jumped out at a car and scared a hell of a lot of people =]

Me and my friend were running at cars going like 60 mph, then stopping right by where the car would go by. We had a few people honk, then someone swurved a bit. Someone also stopped and asked us what the hell we were doing. Finally, someone called the cops, they showed up, and made us stop.
